name: Rohan Patel
visual_description: An Indian teenage boy, roughly 16 years old, slender build. He is wearing the standard Gandhinagar school uniform: a neat beige short-sleeved shirt tucked tightly into dark brown school trousers, a black belt, and black school shoes. A school ID card hangs around his neck on a lanyard. His unique features include neatly parted oiled dark hair, thick black rectangular glasses, and a digital Casio watch on his wrist. He carries a slightly beat-up laptop under his arm. Nervous yet focused expression
personality_description: Soft-spoken, intelligent, anxious but determined, loves coding, overthinks everything, loyal friend.
